articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Myanmar unity government tells ASEAN no talks until prisoners freed - CNA
articles.description: Myanmar's pro-democracy unity government, which includes members of parliament ousted by the military coup, has told Southeast Asia's regional bloc that it will not engage in talks until the junta releases all political prisoners.

articles.title: Elon Musk trolls Jeff Bezos as space race between world's richest men heats up - AsiaOne
